contents.text: Welcome to Walmart Labs South Bay, where a single line of code can change the way the world shops and drive a smarter future.
To learn about current software engineering openings, press 1.
Thank you. Please hold while we connect you with our recruiting team.

navigationGoals: I need information on current software engineering openings and how to apply.
I’d like to talk with a recruiter about software engineering job openings and veteran hiring programs.
I want to discuss senior software engineering openings with the recruiting team.
Learn how to apply for a software engineering job opening
I’m looking to connect with a recruiter about software engineering roles at Walmart Labs South Bay.

contents.text: To explore our internship programs in e-commerce technology, press 2.
Thank you. Please hold while we connect you with our internship coordinator.

navigationGoals: I want to learn about your e-commerce technology internship opportunities and the application process.
I’m an ex-military veteran interested in an e-commerce technology internship—can I learn more?
I’d like information on e-commerce technology internship opportunities and how to apply.
Find out more about the e-commerce technology internship program
I want details on e-commerce technology internship opportunities at Walmart Labs South Bay.

contents.text: For technology and vendor partnerships, press 2.
To discuss API integration and developer tools, press 1.
Thank you. Please hold while we connect you to our partnerships team.

navigationGoals: I’d like to discuss API integration options with your developer partnerships team.
I run a veteran-owned software startup and want to discuss API integration with Walmart Labs.
I need to explore API integration and developer tools partnerships.
Talk about integrating my company’s API with your platform
I’d like to discuss using Walmart’s APIs and developer tools for a campus research project.

contents.text: For logistics and supply chain technology partnerships, press 2.
Thank you. Please hold while we connect you with our supply chain specialists.

navigationGoals: I’m looking to explore logistics and supply chain technology partnership opportunities.
As a veteran entrepreneur, I’d like to explore supply chain technology partnership opportunities.
I’m looking to collaborate on logistics and supply chain technology solutions.
